overview: No Fear In Love contains a series of scenes which tell the individual stories of four girls overcoming their anxieties. Through unintentional physical intimacy these girls reveal hidden desires leading to intensely emotional, natural and beautiful acts of love making.  This is yet another tastefully crafted and sensual piece of lesbian erotica from the acclaimed studio which brought you Unfaithful, The Office Girls and Mums and Daughters.
title: No Fear in Love
